Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8000 to me. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its quality and the unique features it provides, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or needs. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at this exclusive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $8,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $8,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
